dmca.title: shopforphones UK alleges "razr"-sharp claim over MOTOROLA RAZR V3
dmca.body:
[Private]
5th March 2005

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[Private]

Dear Sir or Madam,

This DMCA complaint covers multiple copies of a single source page across different web sites.

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the following page: http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/motorola-razr-v3.htm

The infringing web pages can be found by searching for "MOTOROLA RAZR V3" or an excerpt from the text "aluminium, to make it strong but lightweight, and the RAZR V3".
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.equitableelectronics.com/proddetail.asp?prod=v3
Infringer's Contact Information: 
[Private]
Infringing Web Page:
http://tecbuyz.com/pd_motorola_razr.cfm 
Infringer's Contact Information:
[Private]
Infringing Web Pages (2):
http://www.mobilecityonline.com/wireless/store/phones.asp http://www.mobilecityonline.com/wireless/store/phones.asp?manufacturerid=4
Infringer's Contact Information: 
[Private]
Infringing Web Pages (2):
http://www.justmobile.com/wireless/store/phones.asp http://www.justmobile.com/wireless/store/mcphonedetail.asp?phoneid=519
Infringer's Contact Information:
[Private]

e. Infringing Web Page: http://www.mobiletrance.com/catalog/product_info.php?products_id=37 Infringer's Contact Information:
[Private]

My contact information: [private]@dynamoo.com

I, [private], have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Sincerely,

[Private]
